rows.label: tev000992_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0002
rows.name:
I've just had a revelation while looking at this dog.
Will you hear me out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0003
rows.name:
Despite the valiant efforts of the Interceptors division,
indigens remain as persistent a threat as ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0004
rows.name:
The gates of New LA have stood strong so far,
but they are by no means impregnable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0005
rows.name:
You know the dog guardian statues of the East?
I think we should install one on either side of the gates,
thereby warding off beasts with the Buddha's power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000992_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev000992_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that guardian statues should be installed.

rows.label: qev000992_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev000992_SEL0021
rows.name: Correct his ideas about the statues.

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0006
rows.name: I knew you would perceive the wisdom of my plan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0007
rows.name:
Then our first step should be researching eastern texts
to learn how these statues are engineered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Hmm? Yes, engineered. Guardian dogs are powerful
defensive weapons that have protected temples since
ancient times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0009
rows.name:
They repel invaders by emitting blinding beams of
divine lights from their mouths. ...Er, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hmm... It seems from the look on your face that I may
have misunderstood their specific defensive capabilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0011
rows.name:
...What? The statues are mere superstition, you say?
And they aren't even dogs, but lions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0012
rows.name:
Lions... I see... Well, I suppose placing lions at
defensively significant locations is equally inspired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0013
rows.name: Truly, the mysticism of the East is beyond compare![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0014
rows.name:
I thank you for your correction, and bow to your
extensive knowledge of the subject.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0015
rows.name:
I am always looking for ways to harness the power of
the Buddha to New LA's benefit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0016
rows.name:
Sadly, I haven't yet found a good way of doing so.
Perhaps this sort of thing is not my forte.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0017
rows.name: Ah, but it might be yours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0018
rows.name:
Well then? How can we illuminate this city with the
light and love of the Buddha?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev000992_JNK0030
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev000992_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest building a giant Buddha at New LA's center.

rows.label: qev000992_JNK0040
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev000992_SEL0041
rows.name:
Fill your heart with love and
tell Bozé that is not the way.

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oh ho! Now that is a grand idea. Better yet, let's build
it as a giant Skell that can move and fight as needed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0020
rows.name:
Then it can serve as the city's guardian both literally
AND figuratively![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'd better go find Secretary Nagi and Commander
Vandham and propose this to them directly.
We will call it...Project N.I.R.V.A.N.A![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0022
rows.name:
And once the mega-Buddha Skell N.I.R.V.A.N.A.
is complete, I want you to be my co-pilot in the
defense of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0023
rows.name:
Oh... Just now, as the light cast a halo behind you,
I saw a vision of the Buddha upon your face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0024
rows.name:
But of course. That's my answer. The Buddha's path
is not about physical things—it's about finding
enlightenment within each of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0025
rows.name:
What a fool I've been! We never needed such things
as lions and dogs and statues![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0026
rows.name:
Thank you. I will remember this teaching of the Buddha
forever, and use it to protect New LA by pulverizing
all who would stand against us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000992_MSG0027
rows.name:
And I'll be counting on you to watch over me with that
uncanny, Buddha-like gaze.[ST:wait ]
